place: Victoria Palace Hotel, 6 rue Blaise Des goffe (rue de Rennes)
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Larbaud: All my books and MSS are packed up (Anna Livia with them) so I cannot find what I promised. It is impossible to work any longer in this hotel. However, I send you a short poemâ€”the first I have written for six years. I hope it reaches you before you leave for Genoa. Sincerely yours James Joyce
